title: Bangladesh's first female prime minister Khaleda Zia dies aged 80
generated_title: Zia became Bangladesh's first female head of government in 1991. She led her party to victory in the country's first democratic election in 20 years. Her party had earlier said that Zia would contest general elections in February.
